amendatorysection.catchline: Board; fees; disposition; State Board of Landscape Architects Cash Fund; created; investment.
amendatorysection.para: (1) The board shall establish fees of not less than one hundred nor more than three hundred dollars for applications for licensure, examinations, certificates of licensure, reciprocal licenses, and renewals based on the administration costs incurred by the board. The board shall collect, account for, and remit such fees to the State Treasurer for credit to the State Board of Landscape Architects Cash Fund which is hereby created.

(2) Transfers may be made from the State Board of Landscape Architects Cash Fund to the General Fund at the direction of the Legislature. Any money in the State Board of Landscape Architects Cash Fund available for investment shall be invested by the state investment officer pursuant to the Nebraska Capital Expansion Act and the Nebraska State Funds Investment Act.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Capital Expansion Act, see section 72-1269.
Nebraska State Funds Investment Act, see section 72-1260.
